Real projects from the community. See what people are building with OpenClaw.

**Want to be featured?** Share your project in [#showcase on Discord](https://discord.gg/clawd) or [tag @openclaw on X](https://x.com/openclaw).

## [‚Äã](#-openclaw-in-action)üé• OpenClaw in Action

Full setup walkthrough (28m) by VelvetShark.

## [‚Äã](#-fresh-from-discord)üÜï Fresh from Discord

[## PR Review ‚Üí Telegram Feedback**@bangnokia** ‚Ä¢ `review` `github` `telegram`OpenCode finishes the change ‚Üí opens a PR ‚Üí OpenClaw reviews the diff and replies in Telegram with ‚Äúminor suggestions‚Äù plus a clear merge verdict (including critical fixes to apply first).](https://x.com/i/status/2010878524543131691)[## Wine Cellar Skill in Minutes**@prades_maxime** ‚Ä¢ `skills` `local` `csv`Asked ‚ÄúRobby‚Äù (@openclaw) for a local wine cellar skill. It requests a sample CSV export + where to store it, then builds/tests the skill fast (962 bottles in the example).](https://x.com/i/status/2010916352454791216)[## Tesco Shop Autopilot**@marchattonhere** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `browser` `shopping`Weekly meal plan ‚Üí regulars ‚Üí book delivery slot ‚Üí confirm order. No APIs, just browser control.](https://x.com/i/status/2009724862470689131)[## SNAG Screenshot-to-Markdown**@am-will** ‚Ä¢ `devtools` `screenshots` `markdown`Hotkey a screen region ‚Üí Gemini vision ‚Üí instant Markdown in your clipboard.](https://github.com/am-will/snag)[## Agents UI**@kitze** ‚Ä¢ `ui` `skills` `sync`Desktop app to manage skills/commands across Agents, Claude, Codex, and OpenClaw.](https://releaseflow.net/kitze/agents-ui)[## Telegram Voice Notes (papla.media)**Community** ‚Ä¢ `voice` `tts` `telegram`Wraps papla.media TTS and sends results as Telegram voice notes (no annoying autoplay).](https://papla.media/docs)[## CodexMonitor**@odrobnik** ‚Ä¢ `devtools` `codex` `brew`Homebrew-installed helper to list/inspect/watch local OpenAI Codex sessions (CLI + VS Code).](https://clawhub.com/odrobnik/codexmonitor)[## Bambu 3D Printer Control**@tobiasbischoff** ‚Ä¢ `hardware` `3d-printing` `skill`Control and troubleshoot BambuLab printers: status, jobs, camera, AMS, calibration, and more.](https://clawhub.com/tobiasbischoff/bambu-cli)[## Vienna Transport (Wiener Linien)**@hjanuschka** ‚Ä¢ `travel` `transport` `skill`Real-time departures, disruptions, elevator status, and routing for Vienna‚Äôs public transport.](https://clawhub.com/hjanuschka/wienerlinien)[## ParentPay School Meals**@George5562** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `browser` `parenting`Automated UK school meal booking via ParentPay. Uses mouse coordinates for reliable table cell clicking.](#)[## R2 Upload (Send Me My Files)**@julianengel** ‚Ä¢ `files` `r2` `presigned-urls`Upload to Cloudflare R2/S3 and generate secure presigned download links. Perfect for remote OpenClaw instances.](https://clawhub.com/skills/r2-upload)[## iOS App via Telegram**@coard** ‚Ä¢ `ios` `xcode` `testflight`Built a complete iOS app with maps and voice recording, deployed to TestFlight entirely via Telegram chat.](#)[## Oura Ring Health Assistant**@AS** ‚Ä¢ `health` `oura` `calendar`Personal AI health assistant integrating Oura ring data with calendar, appointments, and gym schedule.](#)[## Kev's Dream Team (14+ Agents)**@adam91holt** ‚Ä¢ `multi-agent` `orchestration` `architecture` `manifesto`14+ agents under one gateway with Opus 4.5 orchestrator delegating to Codex workers. Comprehensive technical write-up](https://github.com/adam91holt/orchestrated-ai-articles) covering the Dream Team roster, model selection, sandboxing, webhooks, heartbeats, and delegation flows. [Clawdspace](https://github.com/adam91holt/clawdspace) for agent sandboxing. [Blog post](https://adams-ai-journey.ghost.io/2026-the-year-of-the-orchestrator/).[## Linear CLI**@NessZerra** ‚Ä¢ `devtools` `linear` `cli` `issues`CLI for Linear that integrates with agentic workflows (Claude Code, OpenClaw). Manage issues, projects, and workflows from the terminal. First external PR merged!](https://github.com/Finesssee/linear-cli)[## Beeper CLI**@jules** ‚Ä¢ `messaging` `beeper` `cli` `automation`Read, send, and archive messages via Beeper Desktop. Uses Beeper local MCP API so agents can manage all your chats (iMessage, WhatsApp, etc.) in one place.](https://github.com/blqke/beepcli)

## [‚Äã](#-automation-&-workflows)ü§ñ Automation & Workflows

[## Winix Air Purifier Control**@antonplex** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `hardware` `air-quality`Claude Code discovered and confirmed the purifier controls, then OpenClaw takes over to manage room air quality.](https://x.com/antonplex/status/2010518442471006253)[## Pretty Sky Camera Shots**@signalgaining** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `camera` `skill` `images`Triggered by a roof camera: ask OpenClaw to snap a sky photo whenever it looks pretty ‚Äî it designed a skill and took the shot.](https://x.com/signalgaining/status/2010523120604746151)[## Visual Morning Briefing Scene**@buddyhadry** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `briefing` `images` `telegram`A scheduled prompt generates a single ‚Äúscene‚Äù image each morning (weather, tasks, date, favorite post/quote) via a OpenClaw persona.](https://x.com/buddyhadry/status/2010005331925954739)[## Padel Court Booking**@joshp123** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `booking` `cli`Playtomic availability checker + booking CLI. Never miss an open court again.](https://github.com/joshp123/padel-cli)## Accounting Intake**Community** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `email` `pdf`Collects PDFs from email, preps documents for tax consultant. Monthly accounting on autopilot.[## Couch Potato Dev Mode**@davekiss** ‚Ä¢ `telegram` `website` `migration` `astro`Rebuilt entire personal site via Telegram while watching Netflix ‚Äî Notion ‚Üí Astro, 18 posts migrated, DNS to Cloudflare. Never opened a laptop.](https://davekiss.com)## Job Search Agent**@attol8** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `api` `skill`Searches job listings, matches against CV keywords, and returns relevant opportunities with links. Built in 30 minutes using JSearch API.[## Jira Skill Builder**@jdrhyne** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `jira` `skill` `devtools`OpenClaw connected to Jira, then generated a new skill on the fly (before it existed on ClawHub).](https://x.com/jdrhyne/status/2008336434827002232)[## Todoist Skill via Telegram**@iamsubhrajyoti** ‚Ä¢ `automation` `todoist` `skill` `telegram`Automated Todoist tasks and had OpenClaw generate the skill directly in Telegram chat.](https://x.com/iamsubhrajyoti/status/2009949389884920153)## TradingView Analysis**@bheem1798** ‚Ä¢ `finance` `browser` `automation`Logs into TradingView via browser automation, screenshots charts, and performs technical analysis on demand. No API needed‚Äîjust browser control.## Slack Auto-Support**@henrymascot** ‚Ä¢ `slack` `automation` `support`Watches company Slack channel, responds helpfully, and forwards notifications to Telegram. Autonomously fixed a production bug in a deployed app without being asked.
